meanings.definition: The quality of being costly or expensive.
meanings.sent1: The expensiveness of the designer handbag made it unaffordable for many people.
meanings.sent2: The expensiveness of the car was evident from its luxurious features.
meanings.sent3: The expensiveness of the diamond ring made the thief think twice about stealing it.
meanings.sent4: The expensiveness of healthcare can sometimes feel like a heavy burden on families.
meanings.sent5: The expensiveness of the rare painting made it a prized possession for the art collector.

meanings.definition: The state of requiring a large amount of money to purchase or maintain.
meanings.sent1: The expensiveness of the vacation package deterred many from booking it.
meanings.sent2: The expensiveness of owning a yacht includes maintenance costs and docking fees.
meanings.sent3: The expensiveness of the concert tickets left the fans disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The expensiveness of running a business can be a challenge for entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent5: The expensiveness of the antique clock made it a valuable heirloom in the family.
